I hate jeans that don't have at least 3 belt loops across the back. These have 1 middle of back 2waist and 2 front. The front 2 are so close together right at the button and makes it difficult to buckle a belt and put it in its own loop before the jeans belt loop. Ridiculous. I don't understand how products can go from manufacturing to the customer without a quality control department checking this type of thing. I bought 2 pair and will never buy anything else from this place. I don't even wear them because of this.

Work in a refinery that requires FR but won't supply us with jeans, so I bought a pair of these a few months ago and will NEVER go back to the thin, flimsy uniform pants again. These are well built and feel substantial. I get Jet and Diesel fuel on them from time to time and they hold up to every wash. Delivery was fast (ordered this 2nd pair in the middle of the pandemic and still got them within a week). If you work a job that requires FR, you can't go wrong with these.

my son works on lineman crew and has to have FR clothing.  I bought a size bigger in the waist to allow for the thin insulates under his clothing but also not too loose without them.  Have bought 3 pair since.  They are much more durable than the thin Carhart they give them to wear.
